title: My Client Keeps Crashing In Champ Select
body: Can I please get help understanding why this is happening? I'm in select for ranked but then my client just freezes and forces my to quit. I have lost series more than once now because of this. Also if anyone has any tips for making this not happen in the future it would be much appreciated.

replies.body:
Most freezes or crashes in champ select are caused by the client losing its connection to the matchmaking service. As a first step, I recommend ensuring your local settings are compatible with our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as these steps commonly resolve this issue.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
